query:
SELECT
                en1.name as name_from,
                en2.name as name_to
            FROM mem_relation as rel,
                    mem_entity as en1,
                    mem_entity as en2
            WHERE (rel.from_id = ? OR rel.to_id = ?)
                AND rel.from_id = en1.id
                AND rel.to_id = en2.id
